title: Ep 08 - Australia shutdown
description: Fake news, conspiracy theories, calls to stay calm. How can the media help contain the deadly spread?
content: KARL STEFANOVIC: Fortress Australia. The nation closes its borders in a desperate bid to slow down the coronavirus. Tourists and visitors banned from entering the country. Millions of Australians left stranded as airlines ground international flights. This mo… [+17412 chars]
